name: Wall of Fire
description: You create a wall of fire on a solid surface within range. You can make the wall up to 60 feet long, 20 feet high, and 1 foot thick, or a ringed wall up to 20 feet in diameter, 20 feet high, and 1 foot thick. Each creature within 10 feet of one side of the wall must make a Dexterity saving throw, taking 5d8 fire damage on a failed save, or half as much on a successful one.
